name: adguard-home
description: AdGuard Home is a network-wide software for blocking ads and tracking, operating as a DNS server and providing a web-based interface to filter content for all devices on the network. It can be self-hosted and customized for family or enterprise networks.
features: Network-Wide Protection: Block ads and trackers for all devices from one location. Protect your entire home or office.
Web Management: Intuitive interface for configuring DNS and filtering settings. Control everything from your browser.
Universal Coverage: Protects phones, tablets, computers, and smart TVs automatically. Every device benefits.
Custom Filtering: Create personalized rules and use extensive blocklist libraries. Tailor protection to your needs.
Family Safety: Parental controls and malicious site blocking keep everyone safe. Peace of mind included.
Detailed Analytics: View comprehensive statistics and logs of all network queries. Full visibility into traffic.
Encrypted DNS: Support for DNS-over-HTTPS, DNS-over-TLS, and DNSCrypt. Enhanced privacy and security.
Cross-Platform: Install on Linux, Windows, macOS, or any compatible system. Works everywhere.
